name: Alice's Patchworks 2
description: Assemble patchwork mosaics, meet your favorite heroes from the world beyond the looking glass and help Alice become the queen!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 1500 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 300 MB available space
